titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Foramsulfuron.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: 4/21/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2008, the duty on Benzamide, 2-(((((4,6-dimethoxy- 2-pyrimidinyl)amino)carbonyl)- amino)sulfonyl)-4-(formylamino)- N,N-dimethyl- (Foramsulfuron).
